text.autoconfig.chestesp.title: ChestESP Settings
text.autoconfig.chestesp.option.enable.@:
This setting allows you to completely disable ChestESP.
ProTip: If you go to Options > Controls > Key Binds, you can set up a keybind to do this more quickly.
text.autoconfig.chestesp.option.style.@T:
Controls how ChestESP will highlight chests.
Boxes only: Chests will be highlighted with a colored box around them.
Lines only: Chests will be highlighted with a line going from your crosshair to the chest.
Lines and boxes: Both of the above.
text.autoconfig.chestesp.option.chest_co: Normal chests will be highlighted in this color.
text.autoconfig.chestesp.option.trap_che: Trapped chests will be highlighted in this color.
text.autoconfig.chestesp.option.ender_ch: Ender chests will be highlighted in this color.
text.autoconfig.chestesp.option.chest_ca: Minecarts with chests will be highlighted in this color.
text.autoconfig.chestesp.option.chest_bo: Boats with chests will be highlighted in this color.
text.autoconfig.chestesp.option.barrel_c: Barrels will be highlighted in this color.
text.autoconfig.chestesp.option.shulker_: Shulker boxes will be highlighted in this color.
text.autoconfig.chestesp.option.hopper_c: Hoppers will be highlighted in this color.
Minecarts with hoppers will be highlighted in this color.
text.autoconfig.chestesp.option.dropper_: Droppers will be highlighted in this color.
text.autoconfig.chestesp.option.dispense: Dispensers will be highlighted in this color.
text.autoconfig.chestesp.option.furnace_: Furnaces, smokers, and blast furnaces will be highlighted in this color.
